article: People like Edison Chen because he is young, good-looking and talented. But some people don't  _  because he likes to make faces and walks in a strange way. No matter  _  people think of him, Edison doesn't care. He likes his own style and his own music . He shows he has more  _  than luck.  _  November 26 , Edison got one of the Lycra in Style Awards in Shanghai because he has been trying to  make a difference  Edison first listened to hip-hop music  _  he was nine . He fell in love with it . Now he's working hard on making music with some Japanese friends .He wants to bring real hip-hop music to China. His music tells young people that there's  _  they can't do. He also has the courage to himself, from his clothes to his hair. Some people don't like his way of dressing.  Others  say he walks like a gorilla. But he thinks it's OK. "My  _  show my style , and my songs tell my feelings ," he said . "If I only listened to others, I may  _  myself."
